channel.title: Timed events
channel.description:
How do you go about creating a timer that runs every like 30 mins and then a random thing will happen.
Im thinking server.java and insert a cycle rand timer or something. Then have item2.randomitem(); be used to add but anyone have a tutorial link or got any suggestions for using client.java for this all? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 15, 2009, 09:57:57 pm[/size][hr]what is this community not very helpful or someshit??s[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 16, 2009, 02:06:16 pm[/size][hr]no help for a person?
